home.aboutText: AKULA is a space for meeting, cultural exchange, education, and entertainment of Ukrainian students at EPFL, and all friends of Ukraine. Our mission is to promote Ukrainian culture at EPFL, in Switzerland, and the world. The association organizes and participates in cultural, recreational, intellectual, and sports events.
